[Home](./index.md) &gt; [forms42core](./forms42core.md) &gt; [FormProperties](./forms42core.formproperties.md)

## FormProperties class

These are global properties used in different parts of the code. If, for some reason, the tags, style classes etc conflicts with other usage, anything can be changed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Properties 
```
